CustomField.description: Stable, unique brand identifier used for configuration and internal referencing (and optional integration/upsert). Must be uppercase letters, numbers, and underscores only (e.g., DONUT_KING).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a unique brand code in the format ABC123_DEF (uppercase letters/numbers/underscores only). This value should never change once created. Example: DONUT_KING.
CustomField.label: Brand Code
